com.letgro.backend.Controller

Class ToBuyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.letgro.backend.Controller.ToBuyController

  • @RestController
public class ToBuyController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for to buy. This class is in charged of requests such as post, get and delete. Author: Leyuan Loh

    • Field Summary

      • createToBuyWithAccountId

        @PostMapping(value="/toBuyItem/account/{id}")
ToBuy createToBuyWithAccountId(@RequestBody
                                                                              ToBuy p,
                                                                              @PathVariable
                                                                              java.lang.Integer id)
        Send a to buy item with id of the account to the database. The method will find the account with the id. Create the ToBuy object with the id, item, and account. Save it into the tobuyDatabase.

      • deleteToBuy
